item.title: FieldWatch
item.description: Developed By: Fieldwatch, and Purdue Research Foundation Summary: FieldWatch is a community mapping tool that allows beekeepers, crop growers, and pesticide applicators to interact through four connected tools: BeeCheck, Fieldcheck, Cropcheck, and Drift Watch.
